info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 14 at 4:05PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Intense snow showers will impact portions of northeastern Lake and central Flathead Counties through 500 PM MST... At 404 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking intense snow showers along a line extending from near Bigfork to near Turtle Lake. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-quarter mile or less. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported heavy snow along eastern portions of Flathead Lake and in the Bigfork area. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Swan Lake, Woods Bay, Bigfork and Finley Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
